index.headerdes: CUBO+ is the first educational program aimed at training the next generation of Bitcoin Salvadoran enthusiasts under the government of President Nayib Bukele, to contribute the Bitcoin adoption and the economic growth of El Salvador.
index.process:
For building the next
Decentralized Generation
index.processdes: We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive learning environment that promotes learning, growth and collaboration.
apply: To be part of cubo+ you must apply to the process within the specific time. You can apply even if you're not a developer since the course is aimed at teaching the basic fundamentals of Bitcoin (Philosophical and economic principles).
Focused on developers who wish to acquire skills in the Bitcoin and Lighning Network protocols
Open to university students interested in learning about the fundamentals of Bitcoin
learn: The objective is to learn the role of Bitcoin and its impact on society. The course modules will depend on the type of application you have submitted.
For non-technical applications, you will delve into the social and economic aspects of Bitcoin as well as why it is needed for our society.
As a developer, you will learn the fundamentals of the Bitcoin and Lightning Network protocols and how to integrate these solutions in your personal projects.
contribute: As a cubo+ graduate, what we expect from you is to apply your knowledge and skills learned in the program to real-world projects and challenges in your environment.
At the end of the program you will have the opportunity to participate in the internship to gain experience with top Bitcoin companies.
Take advantage of the tools acquired in the program to create real solutions that solve real problems in everyday life.
students: At Cubo+ we train agents of change, forging a future where innovation and collaboration define the path, leaving the legacy of a generation that inspires and transforms

mission:
We are a program dedicated to teaching university students, from enthusiastic beginners to experienced developers. We believe that everyone should have the opportunity to understand and participate in the Bitcoin revolution in El Salvador, without barriers or technical limitations.

At Cubo+, we build an inclusive and accessible community. Our mission is to teach Bitcoin, making it easy to understand and apply in everyday life. Join us and let's build the next generation of Bitcoin enthusiasts.

cubo2023.header: Proof of work is freedom
cubo2023.legend: Cubo+ shows to the world how proof of work leads to excellency and freedom fot El Salvador and its students
documentary: A production of The Presidential Bitcoin Office in El Salvador - ¬© 2023 cuboplus. All rights reserved.
cubo2023.timeline: WeScaled !
cubo2023.description: A growing team doesn't need to mean growing pains. With the best features, security, privacy, and the right tool for every step of your journey - Cubo+ allows you to scale your Bitcoin and Lightnig Network knowledge.
content: A group of fifty-four students embarked on an educational journey delving into the intricate foundations of Bitcoin. Guided by accomplished mentors from diverse corners of the globe, the curriculum, meticulously curated by esteemed educators Saifedean Ammous, Giacomo Zucco, Alekos Filini, and Rikki.
The elite cream of the crop, comprising the top 21 students, underwent a meticulously curated two-week course led by a diverse array of mentors hailing from different corners of the globe.
Jimmy Song and Lisa Neigut's seminars

The top 10 boot camp students delved deeper into their knowledge through two additional seminars led by experts. Jimmy Song covered "Programming Blockchain," and Lisa Neigut shared insights on "Understanding the Lightning Network".
Facing on newspaper Forbes !

The distinguished top 6 students seized a unique opportunity to enhance their advanced technical training by embarking on a journey to Italy. Following their intensive training, they participated in the Lugano Plan B event in Switzerland, further enriching their knowledge and expanding their horizons in the field.

descriptions: Through their commitment to education and innovation, The Bitcoin Office and Fulgur Ventures have created the path for talented young people in El Salvador to become the next generation of Bitcoiners.
The National Bitcoin Office of El Salvador under President Nayib Bukele
We invest in early stage startups focused on Bitcoin and the Lightning Network
The cubo+ team thanks our allies for being part of this project and for allowing our students to gain experience in their companies

faq.title: FRQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
faq.description: Further key questions you might have about cubo+, if there's any important question left you can reach us out through the contact form on index or via email to info@cuboplus.dev
questions: Do I need to speak perfect English to join cuboplus?
Does cuboplus have a cost for the course?
Do I need to have degree or professional formation to apply?
Do I need to be 18 years old to apply?
How can I advance to the on-site phase of cuboplus?
Do I have to know about informatics and programming to apply?
answers: The next edition of cuboplus is still in process, we encourage you to follow the account of @cuboplus on twitter to do not miss the next applications!
Cuboplus classes are given by foreign teachers in English so English is not a requirement but it permits you to understand better the topics given.
Cuboplus believes on proof of work and hard money, it teaches how to build solutions on top of Bitcoin and Lightning Protocols, at no time we teach about trading.
Cuboplus doesn't have a cost of participation! we select the most committed and enthusiasm students to receive elite education from elite mentors.
The cuboplus participants are selected based on a process of interviews and tests, there's not any degree or diploma needed.
Cuboplus is a course oriented to the Bitcoin understanding at an economical and filosofical level, so there're no age restrictions.

Cubo+ 2024 will count at first time with a preparatory period where the Bitcoin bases will be taught. It will be required to pass the tests and interviews about informatics and Bitcoin understanding to get to the on-site period.

Cubo+ 2024 will count with a preparatory period where everyone interested on learning about Bitcoin can participate. Then we will pass to the on-site period "Cubo++ 2024" where the technologycal stack about Bitcoin and Lightning Network will be taught and its integration in apps as well.
